text: [Music]
I'm Katherine Lewis and I'm an executive
vice president of mix telematics mix
telematics was actually started in 1996
and our vision is to be the leading
global provider of information and
related services for mobile assets we
employ over a thousand people worldwide
we have customers in more than 120
countries on six continents we manage
over six hundred and seventy six
thousand vehicles in those 120 countries
we are listed on the JSC and the New
York Stock Exchange and we have a market
cap of over six billion rand so we
started out as vehicle tracking company
doing vehicle tracking and security
services for mostly for consumers in
South Africa but over the last two
decades we've evolved to be a true
telematics service provider we have
fleet customers who use our products to
drive efficiencies through their feet
operations we have customers who invest
in our solutions for health and safety
to improve driver and road safety we
help customers comply with local
legislation and regulations around
working hours and driving hours
directives and so we offer a lot of
different benefits to our customers some
of them just want one or two of those
things some of them on all of them but
we've got probably the broadest product
range in the industry which allows us to
offer all of those benefits to customers
wherever they are in the world so if we
hadn't moved to AWS we would be in a
very difficult position today with the
service we are offering our customers
it's really an underpinning the growth
in our company we're growing very well
as a company and we adding subscribers
to our service every single day
and without AWS we would never have been
able to scale our product offering to
ensure that we can offer customers an
absolutely on-time real-time service and
also productivity at our developer
productivity has improved because we
don't have to worry about Harless is
going to get managed on the back end we
can focus on developing our core
applications while AWS takes care of a
lot of the stuff in the background
the main benefits of working with AWS
are certainly the innovation that the
company has to offer that invest
seriously in innovating and bringing out
new technology offerings that that you
can take advantage of the other one is
the availability of the service there's
be nothing when it comes to ensuring
that but the best latest tech which
again we can take advantage of so
availability innovation those are two of
the the biggest things and then the
third one is the service they really
care about their customers and they care
about making you successful in the cloud
and and with them it's been fantastic
working with AWS they have exceeded our
expectations on many fronts I wouldn't
hesitate and recommending them to anyone
and we're really looking forward to
seeing what we will achieve with them in
the future
[Music]
